page.title: 14GOVERNMENT IN COLERAINE
page.content: { THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND SOCIAL } {SERVICES The {CROWN BUILDINGS}SITUATED IN ARTILLERY ROAD,employs 250 civil servants in various departments.These deal with Unemployment and Supplementary Benefits,Ulster Savings,Departments of Agriculture, Architecture and Veterinary Services. Three thousand people in Coleraine are in receipt of Unemployment Benefit,and six thousand receive Supplementary Benefits. The building is to be modernised during this year.Separate cubicles are being introduced where members of the public can discuss their personal business in private. The first floor of the D.H.S.S.contains the offices of the departments listed above.
